column4: hey guys I have an ATI Radion M300 in my dell laptop. are there any drivers that i need to install?
anyone know if the ati m300 needs a driver?
ati drivers should work. I have a 390M in my Compaq.
Look at your /etc/X11/xorg.conf and look for ATI, if you see vesa instead then you'l need to manually install
